solution_line_template: If Mia spent {tv_fraction} of her day watching TV, her remaining time in a day is {total_day_fraction} - {tv_fraction} = {remaining_fraction} for other things.
So, the time left is {hours_in_day} * {remaining_fraction} = <<{hours_in_day}*{remaining_fraction}={time_left_hours}>>{time_left_hours} hours
The time spent studying is {time_left_hours} /{study_divisor} = <<{time_left_hours}/{study_divisor}={study_hours}>>{study_hours} hours.
